title: US Companies to Boost Their Borrowing in 2026, Wells Fargo Says
description: Wells Fargo & Co. expects blue-chip companies — particularly large technology firms funding massive artificial intelligence investments — to borrow more from the US bond market next year, taking advantage of favorable financing conditions.
content:

title: US employers hit two-decade high in October job cuts
description: A new report attributed the rising trend to employers' cost-cutting efforts and adoption of artificial intelligence.
content:
The employment firm that released the new findings attributed the rising trend to employers’ cost-cutting efforts and adoption of artificial intelligence.

title: Indian innovation": France's Special Envoy for AI Bouverot
description: France's Special Envoy for Artificial Intelligence (AI), Anne Bouverot, on Thursday declared that 2026 will be the year of French-Indian innovation, highlighting the deepening collaboration between the two nations ahead of the AI Impact Summit 2026 to be hosted in India.
content: New Delhi [India], November 6 (ANI): France's Special Envoy for Artificial Intelligence (AI), Anne Bouverot, on Thursday declared that 2026 will be the year of French-Indian innovation, highlighting the deepening collaboration between the two nations... [2889 chars]

title: WEF chief warns of crypto, AI, debt bubbles
description: SAO PAULO — The world should watch out for three possible bubbles in financial markets including artificial intelligence, the head of the World Economic Forum (WEF) said on Wednesday, in comments that came amid sharp falls in global technology stocks.
content: SAO PAULO — The world should watch out for three possible bubbles in financial markets including artificial intelligence, the head of the World Economic Forum (WEF) said on Wednesday, in comments that came amid sharp falls in global technology stocks... [1516 chars]

title: Senate Democrats Press Bessent on Oversight of China Investments
description: Senate Democrats are pushing the Trump administration for more information on US efforts to prevent American private equity and venture capital firms from bankrolling advances by China and other adversaries in key technologies including artificial intelligence and quantum computing.

title: ‘Vibe coding’ named word of the year by Collins dictionary
description: “Vibe coding,” a word that essentially means using artificial intelligence to tell a machine what you want instead of coding it yourself, was on Thursday named the Collins Word of the Year 2025.
content:
London, United Kingdom -- “Vibe coding,” a word that essentially means using artificial intelligence (AI) to tell a machine what you want instead of coding it yourself, was on Thursday named the Collins Word of the Year 2025.

title: Meta AI Lab Layoffs Signal a Turning Point in Silicon Valley’s AI Strategy
description: In a stunning announcement that rippled across Silicon Valley, Meta abruptly laid off 600 employees from its Meta AI Lab on October 22, 2025. The decision, announced by Chief AI Officer Alexandr Wang, marks a major strategic pivot for a company that had recently been expanding its artificial intelligence ambitions at record pace. A Sudden

title: Cipher Prices $1.4 Billion Bond for Google-Linked Data Center
description: Cipher Mining Inc. raised $1.4 billion through a high-yield bond offering to help fund the construction of a data center linked to Alphabet Inc.’s Google, the latest example of the artificial intelligence borrowing boom spilling into the US junk-debt market.

title: Alibaba-backed Moonshot releases new AI model Kimi K2 Thinking
description: The Chinese AI startup on Thursday released its newest "Kimi K2 Thinking" artificial intelligence model.
content:
Chinese startup Moonshot on Thursday released its latest generative artificial intelligence model which claims to beat OpenAI's ChatGPT in "agentic" capabilities — or understanding what a user wants without explicit step-by-step instructions.
